predicate.note: Frames file for 'categorize' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry, Framenet entry Categorization. That was a toughie.

example.name: usually passive?
example.text: The MIT project devised ways for E-mail to be automatically categorized [*-1] as top priority if it comes from certain designated senders or requires action in the next couple of days.
example.arg: if it comes from certain designated senders or requires action in the next couple of days
